rgb_game.name: RGB Colour Game
rgb_game.text: This is one of my first ever prjects, I made along side a course I took. I used; HTML, CSS and vinilla JS.

calculator.name: Calculator
calculator.text: This is an old project, but I like it so i got it here. This is just a simple js calculator. I used; HTML, CSS and vinilla JS.

vue_fullstack.name: Vue Guest Book
vue_fullstack.text: This is a fullstacked project that i make to help me understand how to connect the client and server sides. I used; Vue, sass, and node w/ express

nifty.name: Nifty Gallery
nifty.text: My first fullstack project. This was made for a local art gallery, where I designed and made a wordpress tmaplate. I used; php, jQuery & CSS
